info.name: Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion v.16
info.description: Chrome and Firefox compatible. It's a Dark Gray companion for GoogleMonkeyR NEW : - IMPORTANT - CHANGE SUPPORT of : GoogleMonkeyR (update by Roxz) TO GoogleMonkeyR (modified by Cook Wu) "Google - Multiple columns of results, Remove "Sponsored Links", Number results, Auto-load more results, Remove web search dialogues, Open external links in a new tab, self updating and all configurable from a simple user dialogue." It's an alternative to the GM [TS] Schmoogle , which is broken yet ... This Userstyles provide: - More compact Google Search page , by reduce the size of the top header. And tweak some Elements of the interface .....
info.additionalInfo: This Userstyles provide: - Dark Gray color them - Compact Google Search page , by reduce the size of the top header. And tweak some Elements of the interface : - Icon bi-color (top left side of results) which provide Cache or Similar Link when avaiable - PDF, etc files Infos. - Better search images presentation etc... ---etc... You can use too (because the results counter option is broken ) - NOT NEED now to be enable now: Google - GM - Google Monkeyr - Counter GM ADAPTATION for ( but NOT NEED NOW to be enable because solved with the Cook Wu's version ) : - FaviconizeGoogle: Because previous version of MonkeyR don't display them. - Super_preloaderPlus_one_New: Useful for the use of an autopager. You can use too: - Linkify Plus Plus - Google Search Extra Buttons - Google Search Region - Google site: Tool (Site results / Exclude sites) LAST CHANGES: V.6 ... 16: - Correction for Number of Results by Rows (now respect your choice..., i hope) - IMPORTANT - CHANGE SUPPORT of : GoogleMonkeyR (update by Roxz) TO GoogleMonkeyR (modified by Cook Wu) v.13: Re-Adaption for ; FaviconizeGoogle - NOT NEED now and Google - GM - Google Monkeyr - Counter - NOT NEED now v.12: - Change Support of : GoogleMonkeyR v.1.7.3.1 [ Working version Updated by Kilvoctu ] to: GoogleMonkeyR (update by Roxz) - Many corrections/improvements: Images results, top header etc... v.5: - Correction For Columns - cf Topogiz : https://greasyfork.org/fr/forum/discussion/comment/24805/#Comment_24805 v.4: - Add support for domain("encrypted.google.com") - Google Search - Visible Cached + Similar links - Add Red/Black Bi-Color Icons for HOVER TWEAK of : https://userstyles.org/styles/64844/google-search-visible-cached-similar-links Thanks To Luckymouse !
